Welcome to JDO_V-V’s documentation!¶

V-V for raw reads.

# TODO: add support for paired and single end inputs

VV.raw_reads.VV(input_path: str, paired_end: bool)¶

Performs validation and verification for input of RNASeq datasets

Args:

input_path: path where the raw read files are location paried_end: True for paired end, False for single reads
